page.title: 16GAMES-STANION-(CONT.)
page.content:
{ICE CREAM Someone is on and they go to the top of the playground and she turns around everybody runs up.Then she turns around and if anybody's moving they start to make a chain it carries on until there is only one person left she runs up and touches the person on the end of the chain's hand and shouts ICE CREAM then they all run down.
{HARES & HOUNDS In HARES & HOUNDS there are two people on, all the rest are running around the playground when you are tug you're on too.This carries on until everybody's caught.The first two people caught are on.
